name: AsciiDoc
description: Installs AsciiDoctor, Asciidoctor PDF and AsciiDoctor Diagram.

asciidoctorVersion.description: Version of AsciiDoctor to install. Use 'latest' for the most recent version.

asciidoctorPdfVersion.description: Version of Asciidoctor PDF to install. Use 'latest' for the most recent version.

asciidoctorDiagramVersion.description: Version of Asciidoctor Diagram to install. Use 'latest' for the most recent version.
